==Profile==
<!--Detailed story/lore information goes here.-->
Guelet is a Meropide [[guard]] that works for Wriothesley. She helps him uncover the secret of the [[Beret Society]].

===Appearance===
<!--Keep appearance section short and concise. Limit to 2 paragraphs with 3-4 sentences each.-->
She has dark crimson hair and green eyes.
